item.title: OpenAI is hopeful GPT-5 will compete a little more
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: OpenAI's next big foundational model is GPT-5, and the AI startup is hoping that the model will compete a little more with rivals. [...]

item.title: ChatGPT rolls out Memory upgrade for free users
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: ChatGPT's memory feature is now better and capable of referencing past conversations for free accounts. [...]

item.title: Hewlett Packard Enterprise warns of critical StoreOnce auth bypass
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) has issued a security bulletin to warn about eight vulnerabilities impacting StoreOnce, its disk-based backup and deduplication solution. [...]

item.title: Coinbase breach tied to bribed TaskUs support agents in India
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A recently disclosed data breach at Coinbase has been linked to India-based customer support representatives from outsourcing firm TaskUs, who threat actors bribed to steal data from the crypto exchange. [...]

item.title: Microsoft adds quick machine recovery to Windows 11 settings
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft is testing a dedicated page in Windows Settings for quick machine recovery, which will provide users with additional configuration options. [...]

item.title: Malicious RubyGems pose as Fastlane to steal Telegram API data
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Two malicious RubyGems packages posing as popular Fastlane CI/CD plugins redirect Telegram API requests to attacker-controlled servers to intercept and steal data. [...]

item.title: Mozilla launches new system to detect Firefox crypto drainer add-ons
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Mozilla has developed a new security feature for its add-on portal that helps block Firefox malicious extensions that drain cryptocurrency wallets. [...]

item.title: Scattered Spider: Three things the news doesn’t tell you
item.dc:creator: Sponsored by Push Security
item.description: Scattered Spider isn't one group — it's an identity-first threat model evolving fast. From vishing to AiTM phishing, they're exploiting MFA gaps to hijack the cloud. Watch the Push Security webinar to learn how their identity-based tactics work — and how to stop them. [...]

item.title: CISA warns of ConnectWise ScreenConnect bug exploited in attacks
item.dc:creator: Ionut Ilascu
item.description: CISA is alerting federal agencies in the U.S. of hackers exploiting a recently patched ScreenConnect vulnerability that could lead to executing remote code on the server. [...]

item.title: Victoria’s Secret delays earnings release after security incident
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Fashion retail giant Victoria's Secret has delayed its first quarter 2025 earnings release because of ongoing corporate system restoration efforts following a May 24 security incident. [...]

item.title: Google patches new Chrome zero-day bug exploited in attacks
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Google has released an emergency security update to fix the third Chrome zero-day vulnerability exploited in attacks since the start of the year. [...]

item.title: Android malware Crocodilus adds fake contacts to spoof trusted callers
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The latest version of the 'Crocodilus' Android malware has introduced a new mechanism that adds a fake contact on the infected device's contact list to deceive victims. [...]

item.title: Cartier discloses data breach amid fashion brand cyberattacks
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: Luxury fashion brand Cartier is warning customers it suffered a data breach that exposed customers' personal information after its systems were compromised. [...]
